sentences.sContent: They darted spears at the seal.
"And we had a surprising result from an experiment with one seal following another," he said.
sentences.sContent_eng: "And we had a surprising result from an experiment with one seal following another," he said.
sentences.sCn: “并且，我们在一项实验中惊奇地发现，一直海豹紧跟着另一只。”他说。

sentences.sContent: Not long after setting off, Eliyah spots a grey seal resting on some thick ice. He stops the boat and Tommy jumps out.
sentences.sContent_eng: Not long after setting off, Eliyah spots a grey seal resting on some thick ice. He stops the boat and Tommy jumps out.
sentences.sCn: 出发后不久，艾里亚就看见一头灰色的海豹在一块厚冰上休憩，他停下船来，汤米跃身跳出船去。

synos.tran: [机]密封；印章；[皮革][脊椎]海豹；封条；标志

phrases.pCn: n. 橡胶密封圈；橡皮垫；橡胶塞；橡皮密封
轴封，轴封装置；主轴密封
迷宫式密封；曲径密封垫片

words.tran: 封闭，[机] 密封；补铸件的漏洞；猎捕海豹业
盖印人；检验员；密封层；捕海豹的船或猎人

remMethod.val: sea(海洋)+l(看作love， 爱)→海豹是可爱的海洋动物→海豹

trans.tranOther: a large sea animal that eats fish and lives around coasts
